org.middleheaven.io.repository.machine
Class FileIOWatchService

java.lang.Object
  org.middleheaven.io.repository.machine.FileIOWatchService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, WatchService
public class FileIOWatchService
extends Object
implements WatchService

Watches a folder for updates. The listeners are informed if changes are made to the folder content, namely :

    • The number of files changes
